response.overview: Dreamality is a coming-of-age psychological drama about Ben, an incoming senior whose subconscious begins to overtake his waking life. As ambition, fear, and friendship collide, he must decide what’s real, what’s imagined, and what he’s willing to lose to achieve control.
response.tagline: What if your subconscious could live life better than you?
response.title: Dreamality
